name: Guess Or Get Less
description:
In this short stealth game your brother and you plan to win 1 Million Dollars at the very popular Gameshow "Guess Or Get Less". But not the conventional way. While John, your brother, attends the show as one of 20 candidates, your task is to sneak into the backstage area of the TV studio, while listening to a live stream of the show, and quickly find the right answers to the questions of the game, to assist John.

This was made for the Beginners Circle Jam and is my first "real" game, I made in Godot after I got into it 1 or 2 months ago. And it was a whole lot of work. I'm glad, that I can sleep more than 3 hours per night again now.
